description:
A Snort IDS/IPS dashboard.

Based on the setup from IT Security Labs:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WWitHleGFd8

And the original Security Panel dashboard by Tal Bar-Or:

https://grafana.com/grafana/dashboards/3099

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) * 1000 AS time,
  temperature AS "Temperatura"
FROM system_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) * 1000 AS time,
  cpu_usage AS "Uso de CPU %",
  disk_usage AS "Uso de disco"
FROM system_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) * 1000 AS time,
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM alerts
WHERE priority = 1
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) DIV 60
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) * 1000 AS time,
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM alerts
WHERE priority = 2
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) DIV 60
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) * 1000 AS time,
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM alerts
WHERE priority = 3
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) DIV 60
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) * 1000 AS time,
  COUNT(*) AS value,
  CASE
    WHEN priority = 1 THEN 'Severa'
    WHEN priority = 2 THEN 'Media'
    WHEN priority = 3 THEN 'Baja'
  END AS metric
FROM alerts
WHERE timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY
  metric,
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(timestamp) DIV 60
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
  CONCAT(
    severity, ' - ', msg
  ) AS label,
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM (
  SELECT
    msg,
    CASE 
      WHEN priority = 1 THEN 'Severa'
      WHEN priority = 2 THEN 'Media'
      WHEN priority = 3 THEN 'Baja'
    END AS severity
  FROM alerts
  WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
) AS sub
GROUP BY label

SELECT
  proto AS metric,
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM alerts
WHERE timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY proto
ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT
  src_addr AS metric,
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM alerts
WHERE timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY src_addr
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  CASE dst_port
    WHEN 20 THEN '20 - FTP'
    WHEN 21 THEN '21 - FTP'
    WHEN 22 THEN '22 - SSH'
    WHEN 23 THEN '23 - Telnet'
    WHEN 25 THEN '25 - SMTP'
    WHEN 53 THEN '53 - DNS'
    WHEN 80 THEN '80 - HTTP'
    WHEN 110 THEN '110 - POP3'
    WHEN 143 THEN '143 - IMAP'
    WHEN 443 THEN '443 - HTTPS'
    WHEN 3306 THEN '3306 - MySQL'
    WHEN 3389 THEN '3389 - RDP'
    WHEN 8080 THEN '8080 - HTTP-Alt'
    ELSE CONCAT(dst_port, ' - Unknown')
  END AS metric,
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM alerts
WHERE dst_port IN (
    20, 21, 22, 23, 25, 53, 80, 110, 143, 443, 3306, 3389, 8080
)
  AND timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  dst_addr AS metric,
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM alerts
WHERE timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY dst_addr
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) * 1000 AS time,
  COUNT(*) AS value,
  proto AS metric
FROM alerts
WHERE timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000)
GROUP BY
  proto,
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) DIV 60
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT
  timestamp AS "Hora",
  msg AS "Alerta",
  src_addr AS "Origen",
  dst_addr AS "Destino",
  dst_port AS "Puerto",
  CASE
    WHEN msg LIKE '%PROTOCOL%' THEN 'Alerta de protocolo'
    WHEN msg LIKE '%http%' THEN 'HTTP'
    ELSE 'Tráfico desconocido'
  END AS "Clase de alerta",
  CASE priority
    WHEN 1 THEN 'Alta'
    WHEN 2 THEN 'Media'
    WHEN 3 THEN 'Baja'
    ELSE 'Desconocida'
  END AS "Severidad"
FROM alerts
WHERE timestamp >= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from} / 1000)
  AND timestamp <= FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to} / 1000)
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 100

title: Snort IDS/IPS Dashboard
